metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0067 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In f2fs_xattr_generic_list of xattr.c, there is a possible out of boundsread due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local informationdisclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is notrequired for exploitation.Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel.Android ID: A-120551147.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
